participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and energetic, enjoys trying new things and staying active.
participant_1.background: My family is continuously growing. I am a professional tennis player. I live in a three storey house. I enjoy long walks with my dog. I am married to a doctor.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Creative and nostalgic, loves expressing herself through dance and music.
participant_2.background: I also like old school hip hop. I take dance lessons once a week. I was born in the early 80 s. I love new kids on the block. My favorite toy as a child as my lite brite.

content.text: What do you like to do for fun?
I enjoy taking dance lessons once a week.
That's great! I love dancing too. What kind of dance do you like to do?
I like to do hip hop and break dancing.
Cool! I used to do hip hop when I was younger.
Oh, really? That's awesome! What was your favorite dance move?
My favorite dance move was the windmill.
The windmill! That's a classic. I can do that one too.
Really? That's awesome! I haven't done it in years.
We should do it together sometime.
That would be fun!
Great! I'll bring my dancing shoes.
Awesome! I'll bring my Lite-Brite.
What?
My Lite-Brite. It was my favorite toy as a child.
Oh, I remember those! I used to love mine too.
We should bring them to our dance class and see if we can make any cool designs.
That would be so much fun!
Great! I'll bring mine next time.
Awesome! I can't wait!
